mapper.insert: insert into approval_doc (user_id, dept_id, grade_name, position_name, form_code, approval_doc_title, contents, created_at, approval_count, doc_status, enforcement_date, doc_del_status) values (#{userId}, #{deptId}, #{gradeName}, #{positionName}, #{formCode}, #{approvalDocTitle}, #{contents}, #{createdAt}, #{approvalCount}, #{docStatus}, #{enforcementDate}, 0);
